text: Marian Lăzărescu (born July 17, 1984) is a Romanian luger who has competed since 1999. He finished 15th in the men's doubles event at the 2006 Winter Olympics in Turin. Lăzărescu's best finish at the FIL World Luge Championships was 18th in the men's doubles event at Park City, Utah in 2005. ==References== *2006 luge men's doubles results *FIL-Luge profile Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Romanian male lugers Category:Olympic lugers of Romania
title: Marian Lăzărescu
